Summary: They have grouped like constellation Ursa.
divs: Sighting DetailsThey have grouped like constellation Ursa, after they regrouped to a vertical row then flew off, 4 object hanging in the air, on the horizon flew 2 more brightly shining object, and then they went away, one after the pair remained one object, which flew quickly into the distance.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Geneva
There were no other sightings in Geneva on or around July 11th 2010
